name: Hill Racer 2
description:
The balls have had it with just riding down their local hills, so now they've decided to take their business world wide!

Race your balls down the hill in a variety of awesome locations, like Greece, Japan, the Netherlands, Egypt and Hawaii! Rep your nation by beating other balls! Beat your friends on the leaderboard, to show them who's boss!

What are you waiting for? Install now to start racing. Ready? Set? GO!
